      • findClient

        public java.lang.String findClient(java.lang.String lastName,
                          java.lang.String code)
        A method to determine whether or not a given person, identified by a surname and a postcode is a client of the Insurance company. If so, the client's ID should be returned.
        Parameters:
        lastName - the surname of the person to be searched for.
        code - the postcode of the address of the person to be searched for.
        Returns:
        the Client ID if the person has at least one policy with the company, null otherwise.

      • getClientDetails

        public ClientDetails getClientDetails(java.lang.String givenID)
        A method to get the client details corresponding to a given client ID.
        Parameters:
        clientID - the client ID whose details are required.
        Returns:
        the required ClientDetails if found, null otherwise.

      • sameAddressCheck

        public ClientDetails sameAddressCheck(ClientDetails cDetails)
        A method to determine another client who has the same address as the client whose details are given.
        Parameters:
        cDetails - the client details whose address is to be searched for.
        Returns:
        the ClientDetails of a client with the same address if there is one, null otherwise.
